page.title: 06MR PARR CONT.
page.content: enjoys his postround in{Fordham.}But has been embarrassed a few times. Once he has split his trousers and his hat has been blown off and been crushed by a passing car. It takes about one year to get to know how to be a{ postman. {Mr. Parr}has more than one job he also keeps the{cemeteries clean,}cuts the grass and hedges and{digs graves}which is a difficult job so he sometimes has help.{Mr. Parr's}spare time is mostly in the evening and he plays{snooker}in a club and he also plays{bowls}at {Chippenham}where he has played since he was{13.}At Christmas{Mr. Parr dresses up as{Father Christmas}and his wife makes his costume. He has dressed up as{Father Christmas for 7 years}and he goes to{playschools,}and he also goes to the{Grove in a grotto. Mr. {Parr's}favourite job is being a {postman. Mr. Parr}has seen a lot of
